Introduction
This topic contains information on eligibility requirements for Veterans treated with NRI under 38 U.S.C. 1720E, including
description of NRI
backgroundÂ on NRI use in the military
policy on services provided to Veterans
eligibility requirements for medical care
types of examinations and care offered
, and
RO involvement in verifying eligibility
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section F - Medical Treatment for Veterans Treated with Nasopharyngeal Radium Irradiation (NRI)
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section F
